overview.en: Odin Chain is a Web ecological public blockchain designed with the help of blockchain technology and the advertising smart contract, which will effectively solve many problems existing in Internet advertising. Developers can develop independent browsers by relying on open public blockchains. Odin Token is the only value carrier that can be transferred in the whole ecology.The Browsers have integrated media recommendations, digital assets wallets and exchanges, etc, which makes it easy for users to manage all kinds of digital assets. Due to the tremendous usage for the browsers, the web ecological diversity and the convenient minimalist management way, we believe that Odin Chain will become the world's largest public blockchain with the most participating nodes
overview.zh: Odin chain是借助区块链技术和广告智能合约设计的Web生态公链，将有效解决互联网广告存在的诸多问题。开发者可以依托开放的公链接口开发独立的浏览器，odin token是全生态中唯一可以流转的价值载体。浏览器集成了媒体推荐，数字资产钱包和交易所等，便于用户管理各类数字资产，由于浏览器的巨大使用量，和web生态的多样性，以及便捷参与极简管理的方式，相信在不远的将来，odin chain将会成为全球参与节点最多的公链
